PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04882020-06-25HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActTobacco and Vaping Products Act
SubjectVaping Products Promotion Regulations
PrecisVAPING PRODUCTS PROMOTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) protect young persons from inducements to use vaping products by prohibiting advertising that can be seen or heard by them, including the display of vaping products and vaping product-related brand elements at points of sale; and (2) enhance public awareness about the health hazards or health effects of using vaping products by requiring that advertising convey a health warning that would enable adults to make an informed choice re-garding the use of these products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0143 Publication Date: 2020-07-08
AttachmentsAttachment
